text: Mari Johanna Kiviniemi (born 27 September 1968) is a Finnish politician. She is the second female Prime Minister of Finland from 2010 to 2011.Skard, Torild (2014) "Finland's three national leaders" in Women of power - half a century of female presidents and prime ministers worldwide, Bristol: Policy Press , pp. 407-14 On 25 August 2014, she became Deputy Secretary-General of the OECD.[Mari Kiviniemi, Deputy Secretary-General, OECD http://www.oecd.org/about/whodoeswhat/mari-kiviniemi.htm] ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Finland Category:OECD
title: Mari Kiviniemi
